General.Name: Edison Opto Corp
General.Description: Edison Opto Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells LED lighting products in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides LED components, AC/DC modules, LED module and strips, and street/outdoor lighting products; horticulture and stage lighting products, as well as automotive lighting products; and UV modules and infrared emitters. It also offers integrated lighting design manufacturing services. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 17, Qiaohe Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235029
